title: "Apple Adds Subscription Bundle Pricing for Developers as Competition Heats Up"
text: "As app developers look to drive subscription loyalty in the face of increasing competition
source_name: Apple is making it possible for players in the space to offer bundled subscription pricing. The tech giant announced Friday (Dec. 15) in a post on its site for developers that it is testing the feature."

title: "How Amazon Is Tackling Generative AI"
text: "Amazon Web Services Vice President Mai-Lan Tomsen Bukovec shares what's top of mind for the c-suite executives with generative AI right now
source_name: what challenges they're facing and what's ahead in 2024. She speaks with Ed Ludlow and Caroline Hyde on ""Bloomberg Technology."

title: "Apple pauses US sale of latest Watch models over patent clash"
text: "Apple on Monday said it will stop selling some of its smartwatch models in the United States while it fights a patent battle over technology for detecting blood oxygen levels."
